title: OptionTypeEnum
description: The enumerated values to specify the type or strategy of the option.

oneOf.title: Call
oneOf.description: A call option gives the holder the right to buy the underlying asset by a certain date for a certain price.

oneOf.title: Payer
oneOf.description: A 'payer' option: If you buy a 'payer' option you have the right but not the obligation to enter into the underlying swap transaction as the 'fixed' rate/price payer and receive float.

oneOf.title: Put
oneOf.description: A put option gives the holder the right to sell the underlying asset by a certain date for a certain price.

oneOf.title: Receiver
oneOf.description: A 'receiver' option: If you buy a 'receiver' option you have the right but not the obligation to enter into the underlying swap transaction as the 'fixed' rate/price receiver and pay float.

oneOf.title: Straddle
oneOf.description: A straddle strategy, which involves the simultaneous buying of a put and a call of the same underlier, at the same strike and same expiration date
